price: They say, “Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of punishment] before the Day of Reckoning.”
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
